resources.string: You need to calculate BMI first.
You have a healthy weight, which minimizes the risks of suffering from various diseases and provices a better quality of life. Keep it up!
You are underweight, which can be a sign of an underlying disease. It can also cause other health problems, like anemia or a weakened immune system.
You are overweight, which means that you have an increased risk of suffering a stroke or a heart disease. Consider losing weight to improve your quality of life.
You are obese, which can lead to chronic diseases like diabetes, cancer or high blood pressure and may result in death. Try to change it before it\'s too late.
Calculate some BMIs for them to appear here!
Click the BMI value to find out more!
